DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Regadenoson Versus Intravenous Adenoscan® Fractional Flow Reserve ( FFR )
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective open label , single center pilot trial evaluate regadenoson compare Adenoscan® give IV assessment Fractional Flow Reserve . Forty eight subject enrol get Adenoscan® administer via IV follow Regadenoson IV .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective left heart catheterization Age ≥ 18 year ( female child bear potential ) Able provide write informed consent Contraindications administration either Adenoscan® Regadenoson High degree AV block , sick sinus syndrome without function pacemaker Symptomatic bradycardia Recent STEMI ( < 5 day ) Recent NSTEMI ( < 5 day ) peak CK > 1000 IU Dipyridamole use within 24 hour Adenoscan® contraindicate ( hypersensitivity Adenoscan® , Regadenoson , aminophylline Known severe bronchoconstrictive lung disease
